subject: Tableau dashboards failing to load
description: Users in the Finance team report issues accessing ESG dashboards on Tableau. Timeout after 30 seconds.

subject: Power BI dashboards slow for Compliance
description: Compliance users face delays when opening dashboards in Power BI. No error message, just long load times.

subject: HR Portal down
description: 500 server error when accessing the internal HR portal at https://hr.bnpparibas.com. Reported by HR users.

subject: JIRA access needed
description: Sophie Durand requests edit access to JIRA boards for the Retail Banking transformation project.
